extendedInfo.description: CARNIVAL OF SOULS - EVERYONE LOVES A CLOWN (The Originals - Book Two)The story continues in the second book of Jazan Wild's Carnival of Souls, "Everyone Loves a Clown." The ongoing story of Jazan and the other characters continues here. This time, discover the Jexter the clown's twisted origin.Jazan struggles to accept his place within a caravan of the damned. Meanwhile, the witch Mother Yagga will take you on a journey to medieval times, where two kids are just clowning around in the dungeons. There, they stumble upon a painted skull... the skull of a god!Book Two in the Original Carnival Of Souls Series.This e-book is optimized for experiencing on your Android tablet.
